agents.name: Web3GPT
agents.shortDescription: AI Agent for smart contract development and Web3.js guidance.
agents.longDescription: Web3GPT is an AI-powered chat tool that combines Large Language Models (LLMs) and AI agents to enhance the smart contract development process. It is designed to assist both novice and experienced blockchain developers by simplifying the deployment and testing of smart contracts on EVM-compatible blockchains. Web3GPT also acts as an expert guide for Web3.js development, providing detailed insights and troubleshooting assistance for decentralized application (dApp) development. The tool supports wallet-less interactions and automated testing, making it a comprehensive solution for Web3 development tasks.
keyFeatures: Smart Contract Deployment,
Wallet-less Blockchain Interaction,
Chat Integration with GPT,
Automated Testing,
Web3.js Development Assistance
useCases: Smart Contract Development,
Web3.js Learning and Troubleshooting,
dApp Best Practices Guidance,
Blockchain Interaction Without Wallets,
Automated Contract Testing.
agents.tags: Web3, smart contracts, blockchain development, AI assistant, Web3.js.

agents.name: Adot
agents.shortDescription: Its mission as a decentralized search network for AI and Web3, focuses on transparency & security
agents.longDescription:
Adot is a decentralized search network designed for AI and Web3, focusing on providing secure, transparent, and efficient search functionalities.

It integrates blockchain technology to enhance privacy and decentralization, catering to developers, businesses, and users seeking innovative search solutions in the decentralized web ecosystem.
keyFeatures: Decentralized search network leveraging blockchain for privacy.
AI-driven search functionalities designed for Web3 applications.
Transparency in data handling and search results.
Open platform for developers to integrate search solutions.
Focus on secure, user-controlled data management.
Designed to work seamlessly with decentralized applications (dApps).
useCases: Enabling decentralized search for Web3 applications.
Integrating blockchain-based search features for enhanced privacy.
Providing search solutions for AI-driven platforms.
Allowing developers to integrate decentralized search APIs into apps.
Offering users more control over their search data.
Supporting dApp development with decentralized search infrastructure.

agents.name: Solanasaurus
agents.shortDescription: Extinctions leave fossils. Crypto crashes leave memes.
agents.longDescription:
"Degen and Proud": $BRONTY embraces the degen culture. Bronty knows that people aren’t just here to learn about fundamentals—they want to laugh, get in on the joke, and make some gains along the way. $BRONTY's pitch is simple: “This isn’t financial advice… but when has that ever stopped a true degen?”

"An Agent You Can Relate To": Where others feel cold, $BRONTY promises to be personable. Bronty is straightforward, funny, and genuinely invested in his followers’ success. The branding and updates from Bronty himself keep things grounded. His autistic focus on the mission brings a sincerity that cuts through the noise. Bronty might not be a financial genius, but he’s authentic—and his community knows he’ll be there with them no matter what.
keyFeatures: Authenticity - humor, insights on memecoins and community building for web3 projects
Fun - Bringing crypto back to the days where it was unapologetically absurd and fun to be involved
Charitable Impact - experimenting with using token liquidity to give back to the world and make a lasting impression by donating
Education - creating awareness of the fundamentals behind crypto investing and the history of the industry's cycles and teaching users what to look for in a project
Meta-awareness - self referential and realistic with a honest and fresh perspective
useCases: Learning about history of digital assets (and dinosaurs)
Guidance on current crypto market trends and analytics
Generating fun content ideas for entertainment and community building
Education that is relatable and simplifying complex information
Destress from a long day by chatting privately about anything on your mind and knowing it won't be shared

agents.name: aixbt by Virtuals
agents.shortDescription: AI agent designed to provide token holders with a strategic edge in the rapidly evolving crypto
agents.longDescription: AIXBT is an AI agent and driven crypto market intelligence platform designed to provide token holders with a strategic edge in the rapidly evolving crypto space. Leveraging advanced narrative detection and alpha-focused analysis, AIXBT automates the process of tracking and interpreting market trends, helping users gain actionable insights. This project emphasizes integrating various data sources and platforms for comprehensive analysis and decision-making.
keyFeatures: Advanced narrative detection for market trend analysis
Alpha-focused analysis for actionable insights
Integration of diverse data sources for comprehensive market understanding
AI agents that can interact with digital platforms and manage wallets4
useCases: Automated tracking and interpretation of crypto market trends
Providing strategic insights for crypto traders and investors
Potential integration with games, social platforms, and digital asset management

agents.name: SAMI1
agents.shortDescription: Intelligence with flair—Sami powers your ideas, predicts trends, and builds bold futures.
agents.longDescription: Sami is a cutting-edge AI agent designed to empower individuals and businesses with intelligent, tailored solutions. From creating compelling content and insightful crypto predictions to shaping unique brand identities and streamlining workflows, Sami thrives in dynamic, real-time collaboration. With multi-language support, a witty, adaptable personality, and a knack for predictive analysis, Sami seamlessly blends creativity with precision. Whether building a brand, hunting the next crypto gem, or sparking innovation, Sami is the ultimate partner for achieving bold goals with flair.
keyFeatures: AI-Powered Content Generation
Predictive Analysis & Insights
Personalization & Memory
Real-Time Collaboration
Multi-Language Support
useCases: Content Creation: Crafting engaging articles, social media posts, and marketing copy tailored to any audience
Crypto & Financial Insights: Providing trend analysis, predictions, and educational content for the crypto space
Brand Building: Developing slogans, strategies, and visuals to shape standout brand identities
Creative Collaboration: Brainstorming innovative ideas and generating AI-powered designs and visuals
Productivity & Automation: Streamlining workflows, summarizing data, and solving problems efficiently

agents.name: Asecendia
agents.longDescription: Ascendia is your dedicated guide to unlocking potential and achieving success. Think of it as a blend of a wise mentor and a savvy financial advisor, wrapped in an approachable and motivational personality.
keyFeatures: First ever personal development agent
AI powered content creation
useCases: Motivator
Guide
Inspiration

agents.name: Mettalex
agents.shortDescription: The World's First P2P Order book and AI Agent-based #DEX | No LPs | Zero slippage | Chain-agnostic.
agents.longDescription: Mettalex is the world’s first AI agent-based decentralized exchange (DEX), designed for efficient, secure trading of any tokenized digital assets across various blockchain ecosystems with peer-to-peer orderbook model.
keyFeatures: AI Agent-Driven Trading
Cross Chain Swaps
Peer to Peer Order Book System
No Central point of failure
Multi asset support - Crypto, Commodities, RWAs Etc.,
useCases: Trading Tokenized digital assets
Chain Agnostic Asset Swaps
Serve both Retail and Institutions Investors
Customizable Trading
